description: Chinese threat actors use a custom post-exploitation toolkit named 'DeepData' to exploit a zero-day vulnerability in Fortinet's FortiClient Windows VPN client that steal credentials. [...]
title: Chinese hackers exploit Fortinet VPN zero-day to steal credentials

description: Hackers breached U.S. satellite maker Maxar Space Systems and accessed personal data belonging to its employees, the company informs in a notification to impacted individuals. [...]
title: US space tech giant Maxar discloses employee data breach

description: Palo Alto Networks has finally released security updates for an actively exploited zero-day vulnerability in its Next-Generation Firewalls (NGFW). [...]
title: Palo Alto Networks patches two firewall zero-days used in attacks

description: Evgenii Ptitsyn, a Russian national and suspected administrator of the Phobos ransomware operation, was extradited from South Korea and is facing cybercrime charges in the United States. [...]
title: US charges Phobos ransomware admin after South Korea extradition

description: ​Broadcom warned today that attackers are now exploiting two VMware vCenter Server vulnerabilities, one of which is a critical remote code execution flaw. [...]
title: Critical RCE bug in VMware vCenter Server now exploited in attacks

description: Fake Bitwarden password manager advertisements on Facebook are pushing a malicious Google Chrome extension that collects and steals sensitive user data from the browser. [...]
title: Fake Bitwarden ads on Facebook push info-stealing Chrome extension
